au.edu.rmit.tzar.parser

Class YamlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.tzar.parser.YamlParser

  • public class YamlParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Yaml parser / writer. Handles loading project specifications from yaml files, and writing yaml files from ProjectSpec objects.

      • projectSpecToYaml

        public void projectSpecToYaml(ProjectSpec spec,
                     java.io.File file)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Serialise a project spec to yaml and write to file.
        Parameters:
        spec - the project spec to serialise
        file - the file to write to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file already exists, or there is a problem writing to the file
